Signals:

"uri-changed"

 void uri_changed (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, const gchar *uri, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
uriThe new URI.
user_dataData to pass to the handler.

This signal is emitted when a webview, owned by the CreamModule object, loads a new URI.

"title-changed"

 void title_changed (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, const gchar *title, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
titleThe new title.
user_dataData to pass to the handler.

This signal is emitted when a webview, owned by the CreamModule object, got a new title.

"favicon-changed"

 void favicon_changed (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, GdkPixbuf *favicon, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
faviconThe favicon's GdkPixbuf.
user_dataData to pass to the handler.

This signal is emitted when the webview's favicon is loaded.

"progress-changed"

 void progress_changed (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, gdouble progress, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
progressThe page's load.
user_dataData to pass to the handler.

This signal is emitted when a webview, owned by the CreamModule object, is loading a page.

"state-changed"

 void state_changed (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, CreamMode state, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
stateBrowser's state (see CreamMode).
user_dataData to pass to the handler.

This signal is emitted when a webview, owned by the CreamModule object, try to change the borwser's state.

"download"

 gboolean download (CreamModule *self, GtkWidget *webview, const gchar *file_uri, gpointer user_data)
Parameters:
selfA CreamModule object.
webviewA webview owned by the CreamModule object.
file_uriThe file's URI.
user_dataData to pass to the handler.
Returns:
TRUE if the signal was handled (will stop all other handlers).

This signal is emitted when a webview, owned by the CreamModule object, requests to download a file.
